_t_The stop loss and take profit level f: The stop loss and take profit level for a contract on DTrader is calculated based on the formula:

<0>Stop loss and take profit level in the Down direction = asset price × {(-stop loss OR take profit amount - commission) ÷ (stake × multiplier) + 1}</0>
